attributes.action: Re-open save Motherwell concert hall and theatre
attributes.additional_details: This is the only venue in our local community and beyond that you can see a show , hosts dance schools , dance competitions, conferences, local schools use the venue, Panto’s and beyond.
attributes.background: Save Motherwell’s local Entertainment venue used by many in the area and beyond

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about Motherwell Concert Hall are a matter for North Lanarkshire Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.
